artist: Artist: Fukumoto Shigeki; Translator: Meredith McKinney
description: small book with purple and blue resist-dyed fabric cover; pages pierced and bound with red string; fern design on cover with lettering; contains an ink on paper design and 10 pages with colorful cloth inlay triangles, number of triangles correspondes to page number; contains printed essay in English translation: To Dye, Perchance to Dream: The Enchantments of Rozome
markings: resist-dyed in fabric cover: DRAFTBOOK / BIBELOT / BIJOU BOOK / LILLIPUT EDITION; inside page, black ink on paper: Shredded Message / 2009 / [Japanese writing] / FUKUMOTO Shigeki
medium: Rozome, cloth inlay, washi paper, fiber reactive dye, cotton thread, ink on paper
signed: back page, graphite: Shigeki 2010 / [red chop mark]
title: Mame-hon: Counting Song
